content: Give a performance test to project `Krugurt`. The `compiler` speed is important, it mounting the HTML components and turns them into JavaScript Functions with Parameters and Callbacks before rendering them in virtual-DOM.

(WIP) New localization module for Project `Krugurt`, initial features are detecting the user language, load the translations, and cache the translations. Support plurals, context, interpolation and format.
If you prefer not a graphical way, I've made a Terminal-based resume that simply type the command `$ npx loouislow-resume` in your operating system Terminal either Linux or Mac.
